{% extends "layout.html" %} {% block title %} Skiing {% endblock %} {% block content %} {% filter markdown %} ## Your new hobby is: # Skiing Skiing is a means of transport using skis to glide on snow. Variations of purpose include basic transport, a recreational activity, or a competitive winter sport. Many types of competitive skiing events are recognized by the International Olympic Committee (IOC), and the International Ski Federation (FIS). Find out more on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Skiing)! {% endfilter %} {% endblock %}
